title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 18 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Feb 18 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Obama endorses Trump economy by taking credit for it. Bloomberg is buying the Democrat Party. Crazy Bernie can be bought off. Bloomberg has bought off all opposition research in the past, now Trump team flooding media with old videos. Bloomberg not taking Democrats like Trump took over the GOP. Trump tweet storm on Stone. Rush thanks those who have written nice things about him. Bloomberg’s past comments on farmers, women, minorities. Democrats don’t really care about the little guy. VDH on what Bloomberg said about farmers. Paul Harvey’s “So God Made a Farmer”. Bloomberg on rationing health care from the elderly. Obama in 2009: Take the painkiller. Bloomberg pollster Doug Schoen: Public not following release of Bloomberg videos. Caller thinks Bloomberg is condescending to heartland voters.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Pelosi still talking about Rush getting the Medal of Freedom at the SOTU. The left’s caricature of Rush, the left’s smearing of his reputation, doesn’t matter because you the listeners understand him and stand by him. Bloomberg told pregnant female employee to “kill it” if she wanted to keep working. Bloomberg turning Democrat Party upside down to defend him on race, women. Terrell, Meeks, Messina on Bloomberg and black voters. Bloomberg’s NYC Nanny State. Bezos $10B donation for climate change buys off everyone. Bloomberg on China. What’s Bezos going to spend his $10B on? New York caller on Bloomberg’s pettiness. Bloomberg is an autocrat. Jerry Rice praises Trump at WH for pardon of former 49ers owner Eddie DeBartolo Jr. Trump commutes Blagojevich sentence. Trump goes to California.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The Pretenders’ Chrissie Hynde thanks Trump for giving Rush the Medal of Freedom. Bloomberg NDAs with many women who’ve sued him. Bloomberg campaign manager tames CNN anchor by pointing out how much Bloomberg has donated to Planned Parenthood. Boy Scouts file for bankruptcy. Trump on Blagojevich, Kerik, Milken. Bloomberg’s buying social media supporters. Trump pushes media buttons with pardons, they think it’s a signal to Stone. The Boy Scouts should have fought back. The left’s tiresome stereotypes. How the Soviets indoctrinated kids against God. Trump trip to California.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
